def max_distinct_chocolates(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, x, chocolates) = case
        havable = n + x
        distinct_flavors = set(chocolates)
        results.append(min(len(distinct_flavors), havable))
    return results

def max_distinct_chocolates(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, x, chocolates) = case
        havable = n * x
        distinct_flavors = set(chocolates)
        results.append(min(len(distinct_flavors), havable))
    return results
